scripts.build: npm run build --prefix apps/api && npm run build --prefix apps/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix packages/shared && npm run lint --prefix apps/api && npm run lint --prefix apps/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --prefix packages/shared && npm run typecheck --prefix apps/api && npm run typecheck --prefix apps/web
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix packages/shared && npm run test --prefix apps/api && npm run test --prefix apps/web
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix packages/shared && npm install --prefix apps/api && npm install --prefix apps/web
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test
